Body:
_, _, neighbors, distances, dsel_processed, _ = example_estimate_competence
query = np.ones((1, 2))
mcb_test = MCB()
mcb_test.n_classifiers_ = 3
mcb_test.DSEL_processed_ = dsel_processed
neighbors = neighbors[(index), :].reshape(1, -1)
distances = distances[(index), :].reshape(1, -1)
mcb_test.BKS_DSEL_ = bks_dsel_ex2
predictions = np.array([[0, 1, 0]])
competences = mcb_test.estimate_competence(query, neighbors, distances=
    distances, predictions=np.atleast_2d(predictions))
assert np.isclose(competences, expected).all()
pytest.mark.parametrize('index, expected', [(0, [0.66666666, 0.83333333, 
    0.66666666]), (1, [0.83333333, 1.0, 0.66666666])])
